content.en: Robotic reinforcement learning: Researchers are exploring how reinforcement learning algorithms can be applied to improve the learning capabilities of robots in various scenarios. These algorithms aim to minimize the learning space and solve the credit assignment problem, allowing robots to learn in noisy and dynamic environments. By combining reactive and deliberative control paradigms, researchers are achieving better scalability and performance in reinforcement learning for mobile robots. Additionally, efforts are being made to address challenges in scaling up multi-agent reinforcement learning and to strengthen the links between reinforcement learning and robotics communities.
content.da: Robotisk forstærkningslæring: Forskere undersøger, hvordan forstærkningslæringsalgoritmer kan anvendes til at forbedre robotters læringsevner i forskellige scenarier. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at minimere læringsrummet og løse kreditfordelingsproblemet, så robotter kan lære i støjende og dynamiske miljøer. Ved at kombinere reaktive og deliberative kontrolparadigmer opnår forskerne bedre skalerbarhed og ydeevne i forstærkningslæring for mobile robotter. Derudover gøres der en indsats for at tackle udfordringerne ved at skalere multi-agent forstærkningslæring og for at styrke båndene mellem forstærkningslærings- og robotikmiljøerne.
